com.mongodb
Class QueryOpBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.mongodb.QueryOpBuilder

 class QueryOpBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

Utility for constructing Query operation command with query, orderby, hint, explain, snapshot.

                              java.lang.String field,

Adds DBObject to the operation

Parameters:
dbobj - DBObject to add field to
field - name of the field
obj - object to add to the operation. Ignore if null.
sendEmpty - if true adds obj even if it's empty. Ignore if false and obj is empty.
